### Connect to ``ropsten`` network with both ``parity`` and ``geth``

### ``ropsten`` 网络介绍
``ropsten`` 网络是与现有以太坊公网``Mainnet``并行的一条区块链网络，专门供开发者测试使用，其[``parity``](https://github.com/paritytech/parity/blob/master/ethcore/res/ethereum/ropsten.json)下的创世区块如下：

```json
{
	"name": "Ropsten",
	"dataDir": "test",
	"engine": {
		"Ethash": {
			"params": {
				"minimumDifficulty": "0x020000",
				"difficultyBoundDivisor": "0x0800",
				"durationLimit": "0x0d",
				"blockReward": "0x4563918244F40000",
				"homesteadTransition": 0,
				"eip150Transition": 0,
				"eip160Transition": 10,
				"eip161abcTransition": 10,
				"eip161dTransition": 10,
				"eip649Reward": "0x29A2241AF62C0000",
				"eip100bTransition": 1700000,
				"eip649Transition": 1700000
			}
		}
	},
	"params": {
		"gasLimitBoundDivisor": "0x0400",
		"registrar": "0x81a4b044831c4f12ba601adb9274516939e9b8a2",
		"accountStartNonce": "0x0",
		"maximumExtraDataSize": "0x20",
		"minGasLimit": "0x1388",
		"networkID" : "0x3",

		"maxCodeSize": 24576,
```

### 连接到 ``ropsten`` 网络

#### ``parity`` 节点连接至 ``ropsten``

分别根据 [``parity``](https://github.com/paritytech/parity/wiki/Chain-specification) 项目和 [``ethereum``](https://github.com/ethereum/ropsten) 项目，有下面两种连接至 ``ropsten`` 网络的方法：

##### 1. 使用创世区块以及自定义配置文件进行连接

配置文件``~/eth/config.parity.toml``：
	
```toml
[parity]
mode = "last"
mode_timeout = 300
mode_alarm = 3600
auto_update = "none"
release_track = "current"
public_node = false 
no_download = false
no_consensus = false
no_persistent_txqueue = false
	
chain = "$HOME/eth/ropsten.parity.json"
base_path = "$HOME/eth/ropsten.parity/"
db_path = "$HOME/eth/ropsten.parity/chains"
keys_path = "$HOME/eth/ropsten.parity/keys"
identity = ""
light = false
	
[ui]
force = false
disable = false
port = 8181
interface = "127.0.0.1"
path = "$HOME/eth/ropsten.parity/signer"
	
[network]
port = 40303
min_peers = 25
max_peers = 50
nat = "any"
id = 3 
bootnodes = ["enode://20c9ad97c081d63397d7b685a412227a40e23c8bdc6688c6f37e97cfbc22d2b4d1db1510d8f61e6a8866ad7f0e17c02b14182d37ea7c3c8b9c2683aeb6b733a1@52.169.14.227:30303","enode://6ce05930c72abc632c58e2e4324f7c7ea478cec0ed4fa2528982cf34483094e9cbc9216e7aa349691242576d552a2a56aaeae426c5303ded677ce455ba1acd9d@13.84.180.240:30303"]
discovery = true 
warp = true
allow_ips = "all"
snapshot_peers = 0
max_pending_peers = 64
no_serve_light = false
	
reserved_only = false
	
[rpc]
disable = false
port = 9545
interface = "local"
cors = "null"
apis = ["web3", "personal", "eth", "net", "parity", "traces", "rpc", "secretstore","signer"]
hosts = ["none"]
	
[websockets]
disable = false
port = 9546
interface = "local"
origins = ["none"]
apis = ["web3", "eth", "net", "parity", "traces", "rpc", "secretstore"]
hosts = ["none"]
	
[ipc]
disable = false
path = "$HOME/eth/ropsten.parity/jsonrpc.ipc"
apis = ["web3", "eth", "net", "parity", "parity_accounts", "personal", "traces", "rpc", "secretstore","signer"]
	
[dapps]
disable = false
path = "$HOME/eth/ropsten.parity/dapps"
	
[secretstore]
disable = false
	
nodes = []
http_interface = "local"
http_port = 9072
interface = "local"
port = 9073
path = "$HOME/eth/ropsten.parity/secretstore"
	
[ipfs]
enable = false
port = 6002
interface = "local"
cors = "null"
hosts = ["none"]
	
	
[mining]
#author = "0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000000"
#engine_signer = "0xdbb2399620a4dfeb7020a87b5fc7ab00e61fcdaf"
force_sealing = true
reseal_on_txs = "all"
reseal_min_period = 4000
reseal_max_period = 60000
work_queue_size = 20
relay_set = "cheap"
usd_per_tx = "0.0025"
usd_per_eth = "auto"
price_update_period = "hourly"
gas_floor_target = "4700000"
gas_cap = "6283184"
tx_queue_size = 8192
tx_queue_gas = "off"
tx_queue_strategy = "gas_factor"
tx_queue_ban_count = 1
tx_queue_ban_time = 180 #s
tx_gas_limit = "6283184"
tx_time_limit = 100 #ms
extra_data = "Parity"
remove_solved = false
notify_work = ["http://localhost:4001"]
refuse_service_transactions = false
	
[footprint]
tracing = "auto"
pruning = "auto"
pruning_history = 64
pruning_memory = 500
cache_size_db = 64
cache_size_blocks = 8
cache_size_queue = 50
cache_size_state = 25
cache_size = 128 # Overrides above caches with total size
fast_and_loose = false
db_compaction = "ssd"
fat_db = "auto"
scale_verifiers = true
num_verifiers = 6
	
[snapshots]
disable_periodic = false
	
[vm]
jit = false
	
[misc]
logging = "own_tx=trace"
log_file = "$HOME/eth/ropsten.parity/log/parity.log"
color = true
```
	
- 在配置文件中的``[parity]``下的``chain``代表创世区块文件的位置，``[network]``中的``bootnodes``为``ethereum``项目中推荐的两个``ropsten``节点，好像连不上，但是也写在这里。

- 配置文件中如果不指定 ``parity`` 数据的存放路径，则在 ``ubuntu`` 下的默认路径为 ``$HOME/.local/share/io.parity.ethereum``，``macOS`` 下的默认路径为 ``$HOME/Library/Application Support/io.parity.ethereum``
	
- 配置文件和创世区块文件准备完毕后，使用命令
	
	``./parity --config ~/eth/config.parity.toml``
	
	即可连接至``ropsten``网络
	
- 若已知某个节点``B('enode://xxxx@address:port')``，需要在启动时连接到该节点，首先需要将该节点写入某个文件：
	
	``echo -e "enode://xxxx@address:port" >> ~/eth/ropstennodes.txt``
	
	然后使用命令
	
	``./parity --config ~/eth/config.parity.toml --reserved-peers ~/eth/ropstennodes.txt``
	
	启动 ``parity``
	
##### 2. 使用命令行``flag``指定``ropsten``网络进行连接

此方法较简单，输入命令

``./parity --chain ropsten``

即可启动节点，并且所有配置都使用的默认值。如果需要连接至已知节点，参考方法``1``中的介绍

- ``parity`` 节点的 ``console``

	找到 ``parity`` 节点运行时生成的 ``jsonrpc.ipc`` 文件，使用以下命令开启 ``parity`` 控制台：
	``geth attach ~/eth/ropsten.parity/jsonrpc.ipc``

#### ``geth`` 连接至 ``ropsten`` 网络

尝试过手动将 ``parity`` 的创世区块转化成 ``geth`` 的创世区块，然后使用

``geth init genesis.geth.json``

来对区块链初始化，之后连接 ``ropsten``，但是好像并没有成功，所以这里暂时只放上另外一种简单的方法来连接 ``ropsten``。

输入命令

``geth --testnet --fast``

即可。

- 如果已知某节点``B('enode://xxxx@address:port')``，则可通过以下命令在启动节点时连接该节点：

``geth --testnet --fast --bootnodes 'enode://xxxx@address:port'``


### 注意事项

- 由于 ``parity`` 和 ``geth`` 的节点都是使用的相同默认配置，所以他们的默认节点端口和 `rpc` 端口都是相同的，若想同时开启 ``parity`` 节点和 ``geth`` 节点，则需要通过修改 ``parity`` 配置或者在 ``geth`` 启动命令上通过 ``flag`` 来修改监听端口。

	``geth`` 修改端口的 ``flag`` 如下：

	``geth --port 30303 --rpcport 8545``
	
- ``parity`` 的版本务必要更新到 ``1.7.5`` 及以上，建议使用最新稳定版
- ``parity`` 节点的数据量很小，同步速度也很快。目前 ``ropsten`` 区块数量在 ``1,900,000`` 左右。使用 ``parity`` 同步，大概需要3至5小时，本地数据大小大致在 16GB 左右；使用 ``geth`` 同步，大概需要16-20小时左右，本地数据量在 56G 左右。
